text: niṅṅaḷkk kaṭutta śikṣa anubhavippikkukayuṁ, niṅṅaḷuṭe āṇmakkaḷe keānneāṭukkukayuṁ, niṅṅaḷuṭe strīkaḷe jīvikkān viṭukayuṁ ceyt keāṇṭirunna phir'aunṟe kūṭṭaril ninn niṅṅaḷe nāṁ rakṣappeṭuttiya sandarbhaṁ (niṅṅaḷ ōrkkuka.) niṅṅaḷuṭe rakṣitāviṅkal ninnuḷḷa oru kaṭutta parīkṣaṇamāṇ atiluṇṭāyirunnat‌
